pr_title: Keep stub warnings to one line; stack traces truncate subsequent lines

timeline.message: Keep stub warnings to one line; stack traces truncate subsequent lines

timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText: Should we in general avoid doesn't and other contractions? Not really relevant for this PR, but notice that in a message above it's "does not".
timeline.author: wmdietl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1013,14 +1007,12 @@ private void annotate(
                     stubWarn(
                             "Wildcard type <"
                                     + atype
-                                    + "> doesn't match type in stubs file: <"
+                                    + "> doesn't match type in stubs file"
